title: The Barefoot Peasant Woman (1960) Sophia Loren, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Eleonora Brown

sources.title: The Barefoot Peasant Woman (1960) Sophia Loren, Jean-Paul Belmondo, Eleonora Brown
sources.description:
During World War II, Cesira, a widowed mother, flees Rome with her daughter Rosetta to escape the bombings. After surviving violence and trauma on their journey, both struggle to hold onto hope and humanity in a world torn apart by war.

Original Title: La ciociara (1960) | AKA: Two Women, The Barefoot Peasant Woman

Black & white version: https://youtu.be/8vyAxEiEOJ8
